entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 2:24PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Wintry Weather for Wednesday and Significant Storm Friday... A fast moving low will track across the AK Panhandle from North to South on Wednesday. This system will produce 1 to 2 inches of snow along coastal and southern areas and 2 to 4 inches for the central and northern regions. In addition as temperatures warm snow will likely mix or change over to rain for coastal and
